title: FACT CHECK: This is NOT the proposed design of Ram temple in Ayodhya | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
Ahead of the foundation stone laying ceremony of Ram temple in Ayodhya, a graphical picture has surfaced on social media claiming it to be the architectural design of the temple.

The text read: “Architectural View of Proposed Ram Mandir In Ayodhya”

Same post has been shared by several other users. Such posts can be seen here, here, here and here.

ALSO READ: Fact Check: Did Indian Air Force conduct a strike on Nepal?…

NewsMobile fact checked the above post and found it to be misleading.

On putting the above picture through Reverse Image Search, the search led us to an article dated August 13, 2010, on the website of Iskcon News.

As per the article, the building in the picture is of the proposed plan of ‘Temple of Vedic Planetarium’ project.

On digging further we found several videos of graphic simulation of the structure.

In conclusion, the above information establishes that the picture in question has no connection with the Ram temple in Ayodhya.

If you want to fact-check any story, WhatsApp it now on +91 88268 00707
